keyMappings:
# TABS
map J nextTab
map K previousTab
# Move tabs left/right
map <c-k> moveTabLeft
map <c-j> moveTabRight
map <c-h> moveTabLeft count=99
map <c-l> moveTabRight count=99

# SEARCH
# Search DuckDuckGo in new tab
map \ Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=d
# Search the current site (w/ Google, seems more relevant than DDG)
map / Vomnibar.activateInNewTab keyword=gscs

# NAVIGATION
# Passes next keypress to the site
# E.g. <c-[><Esc> executes site's native <Esc> function instead of Vimium's
map <c-]> passNextKey
# Remap find mode to match Nvim
map s enterFindMode
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#

# Search current site
gscs: javascript:location='https://www.google.com/search?num=100&q=site:'+escape(location.hostname)+'+%s'
ddgss: javascript:location='https://start.duckduckgo.com/?q=site:'+escape(location.hostname)+'+%s'

# Basic searches
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s
qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
